programs.name: Addition Program
programs.code: function addition(a, b) { return a + b; } console.log('Result:', addition(3, 5));

programs.name: Factorial Program
programs.code: function factorial(n) { if (n === 0) return 1; else return n * factorial(n - 1); } console.log('Factorial of 5:', factorial(5));

programs.name: Palindrome Check
programs.code: function isPalindrome(str) { let reversed = str.split('').reverse().join(''); return str === reversed; } console.log('Is madam a palindrome?', isPalindrome('madam'));

programs.name: Prime Number Check
programs.code: function isPrime(num) { if (num <= 1) return false; for (let i = 2; i < num; i++) { if (num % i === 0) return false; } return true; } console.log('Is 7 prime?', isPrime(7));
